note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices. Transactions associated with all types of foreign visitors considered, including students or seasonal workers, which can be significant in certain countries.
title: International tourist expenditure within the country they visit
subtitle: This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
sourceDesc: United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO, 2023); OECD (2023); World Bank (2022)
